title: Kali Linux
description: Advanced Penetration Testing Linux distribution loaded with security tools.
commentary: This was my first real dive into ethical hacking. Kali made cybersecurity feel tangible and powerful. I wasn’t just learning theory—I was watching firewalls fall, passwords crack, and knowledge become impact.

title: #IamRemarkable by Google
description: A movement to empower self-advocacy, especially for women and underrepresented voices.
commentary: This initiative taught me something I never learned in engineering school: how to speak up for myself. It gave me the words, courage, and validation to say 'I belong here'—loudly.
